metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for elderly Colombian artisan character
metadata.content_safety_note: CRITICAL: All scenes must be completely age-appropriate for children ages 5-12. No nudity or suggestive content. Bathroom scenes are modest.

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: deep pre-dawn darkness with faint moonlight through wooden shutters
scenes.description: A colonial bedroom in Villa de Leyva lies in deep pre-dawn darkness. Thick whitewashed adobe walls glow faintly blue in the moonlight seeping through heavy wooden shutters. A 75-year-old Colombian woman with silver-white hair in a bun sleeps in a large dark carved wooden bed under layered wool blankets in burgundy and cream, topped by a crocheted bedspread. A black cat, Negrito, is curled at the foot of the bed. On the dark wooden nightstand, a framed black-and-white photograph of a man sits beside a small statue of the Virgin Mary draped with rosary beads. Dark wooden ceiling beams cross overhead. A thick wool rug in warm brown and orange tones lies beside the bed.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, colonial bedroom Villa de Leyva Colombia, elderly woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun sleeping in large dark carved wooden bed, layered burgundy and cream wool blankets, crocheted bedspread, black cat curled at foot of bed, dark wooden nightstand with framed black-and-white photograph and Virgin Mary statue with rosary beads, thick whitewashed adobe walls, dark wooden ceiling beams, heavy wooden shutters, faint blue moonlight, terra-cotta tile floor, thick wool rug, pre-dawn peaceful sleep
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern bedroom, bright room, young woman, dark hair, no wrinkles, inappropriate

scenes.title: Morning Prayer in Bed
scenes.description: Carmen sits upright against the carved wooden headboard, hands clasped together in prayer, eyes closed. The rosary beads are in her hands — cream-colored ivory beads with a small silver crucifix dangling between her fingers. Her lips move silently in morning devotion. The reading lamp casts warm light on her lined face. The Virgin Mary statue on the nightstand watches over her. The crucifix on the whitewashed wall above the headboard is visible. Negrito has settled in a black circle at the foot of the bed. The wool blankets are pulled up to her waist.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round gold-framed reading glasses, sitting upright in large carved wooden bed against headboard, hands clasped in prayer holding cream rosary beads with silver crucifix, eyes closed, cream flannel nightgown, warm reading lamp light on lined face, Virgin Mary statue on nightstand, crucifix on whitewashed wall above bed, black cat curled at foot of bed, burgundy wool blankets, morning devotion, peaceful reverent atmosphere
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern room, no wrinkles, inappropriate

scenes.title: Opening the Wardrobe
scenes.description: Carmen pulls open the carved wooden wardrobe doors. Inside, her clothes hang neatly: long cotton skirts in dark blue, brown, and black; white embroidered blouses on wooden hangers; wool cardigans in burgundy, forest green, and gray; a black wool shawl folded on the shelf above. On the wardrobe floor sit two pairs of shoes. A stack of folded craft aprons sits beside the shoes. The wardrobe smells of cedar and dried lavender sachets hanging from the rod. Carmen reaches for a dark blue skirt and a white embroidered blouse.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, cream flannel nightgown, opening large dark carved wooden wardrobe doors, neatly organized clothes inside (dark skirts, white embroidered blouses, wool cardigans in burgundy and green), black wool shawl on shelf, shoes on wardrobe floor, reaching for blue skirt and white blouse, warm lamp light, colonial bedroom, whitewashed walls, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, modern closet, young woman, dark hair, messy wardrobe, inappropriate

scenes.title: Fixing Her Hair
scenes.description: Carmen's weathered hands work through her silver-white hair, gathering loose wisps and pinning them neatly into the bun at the nape of her neck. She secures it with dark hairpins from a ceramic dish, then slides a tortoiseshell decorative comb into place above the bun. Her movements are practiced and efficient. The small oval dresser mirror reflects her satisfied expression. Dried lavender in a ceramic vase scents the air. On the dresser, beside the mirror, sits a small framed color photo of her four grandchildren.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair, weathered hands gathering hair into neat bun at nape of neck, securing with dark hairpins, sliding tortoiseshell comb above bun, standing at small oval dresser mirror, ceramic dish of hairpins, lace doily on dresser, ceramic vase with dried lavender, framed photo of grandchildren, warm lamp light, colonial bedroom, cream nightgown, practiced morning grooming routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, loose hair, modern vanity, inappropriate

scenes.title: Getting Into Bed
scenes.description: Carmen slides into the large carved wooden bed, pulling the heavy wool blankets up to her chest. The feather pillow cradles her silver-white hair under the cotton sleep cap. She picks up a worn paperback novel by Gabriel Garcia Marquez from the nightstand. A woven bookmark marks her place. The cream flannel nightgown and wool bed jacket are cozy for the cold mountain night. Three cats are on the bed: Michi against her side, Negrito at her feet, Canela between her ankles. The reading lamp casts a warm golden circle.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun under cotton sleep cap, round reading glasses, settling into large dark carved wooden bed, pulling burgundy wool blankets up, cream flannel nightgown with wool bed jacket, holding worn paperback book, warm reading lamp glow, feather pillow, three cats on bed (orange tabby at ankles, gray-white cat against side, black cat at feet), cozy colonial bedroom, dark wooden ceiling beams, evening bedtime routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern bedroom, bright room, no cats, inappropriate

scenes.title: At the Sink
scenes.description: Carmen stands before the pedestal sink, looking at her reflection in the mirror. Her silver-white hair is neatly pinned. She wears her cream flannel nightgown, thick wool socks, and leather slippers. She turns on the faucet and cups her hands under the warm water. A white ceramic soap dish holds a bar of lavender-scented soap. A floral hand towel hangs from a hook beside the mirror. Her round reading glasses sit slightly lower on her nose. The blue-and-white azulejo tiles frame the mirror decoratively.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round gold-framed reading glasses, cream flannel nightgown, standing at pedestal sink in colonial bathroom, turning on faucet, cupping hands under warm water, mirror reflection visible, white ceramic soap dish with lavender soap, floral hand towel on hook, blue-and-white azulejo tile border on walls, overhead light, simple clean bathroom, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, modern bathroom, luxury bathroom, dark hair, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Carmen squeezes toothpaste onto a soft-bristled toothbrush from a plastic cup on the wooden shelf. She brushes her teeth carefully, her reflection visible in the mirror. Her weathered hand holds the toothbrush with a steady grip. Beside the cup on the shelf, a small covered container holds her partial denture cleaning supplies. The faucet runs gently. The blue-and-white azulejo tile border is visible behind her in the mirror.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses, cream nightgown, brushing teeth at pedestal sink, holding soft-bristled toothbrush, toothpaste tube on wooden shelf, reflection in mirror, faucet running gently, blue-and-white azulejo tile border on bathroom walls, small wooden shelf with toiletries, overhead bathroom light, morning hygiene routine

scenes.title: Applying Face Cream
scenes.description: Carmen opens a small bottle of face cream from the wooden shelf, scooping a small amount onto her fingertips. She dabs the cream gently across her cheeks, forehead, and chin, working it in with small circular motions. Her reflection in the mirror shows the careful movements. The cream is a simple moisturizer in a white jar with a green label. She pays attention to the dry skin around her eyes and mouth. The gold frames of her reading glasses catch the light as she tilts her head.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round gold-framed reading glasses, dabbing face cream from small white jar onto deeply lined cheeks and forehead with fingertips, small circular motions, reflection in bathroom mirror, wooden shelf with toiletries, blue-and-white azulejo tile border, cream nightgown, gentle skincare routine, overhead bathroom light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, smooth skin, dark hair, modern bathroom, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Final Mirror Check
scenes.description: Carmen stands before the bathroom mirror for a final check. She wears her white blouse with colorful Boyaca floral embroidery along the collar and cuffs — red, yellow, and green flowers. The dark blue cotton skirt falls to her ankles. Her small gold cross necklace sits at the collar. Round reading glasses are clean on her face. She smooths the blouse front with her hands. Small gold earring studs. Her expression is composed and ready for the day.

scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern bathroom, casual clothes, inappropriate, nudity

scenes.title: Evening Bathroom Visit
scenes.description: Carmen makes her evening bathroom visit. She washes her face at the pedestal sink — a quick rinse with warm water and gentle pat dry with the floral hand towel. She brushes her teeth carefully, rinses, and places the toothbrush back in the cup. She applies a small amount of face cream. The mirror reflects her nightgown-clad figure, the reading glasses, the cotton sleep cap. The blue-and-white azulejo tiles gleam under the overhead light.

scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern bathroom, inappropriate, nudity, suggestive

scenes.title: Stepping Into the Courtyard
scenes.camera_view: courtyard wide shot from kitchen doorway
scenes.description: Carmen steps through the wooden doorway from the kitchen into the interior courtyard. The courtyard is beautiful in early light: stone floor warmed by sun on the eastern side, still in shadow on the western side. Potted red and pink geraniums line the whitewashed walls. Ferns hang from iron hooks on wooden columns supporting the corredor roof. The old stone fountain in the center overflows with trailing vines and pink begonias. Purple and orange bougainvillea climbs the far wall. Canela the orange tabby is sprawled on a warm sunny patch of stone. The air smells of eucalyptus and damp earth.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses, white embroidered blouse, dark blue skirt, burgundy cardigan, dark blue craft apron, stepping through wooden doorway into beautiful colonial interior courtyard, stone floor with morning sun, potted red and pink geraniums along whitewashed walls, hanging ferns on wooden columns, stone fountain planter with trailing vines and begonias, purple and orange bougainvillea on far wall, corredor with clay tile roof, orange tabby cat on sunny stone, Villa de Leyva Colombia, bright morning light
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern patio, concrete, American style, inappropriate

scenes.title: Sitting at the Loom
scenes.lighting: even morning light under corredor shade
scenes.description: Carmen settles onto a low wooden stool at the traditional backstrap loom. She hooks the leather backstrap around her lower back and leans backward slightly, creating tension on the warp threads. The half-finished textile displays a red, orange, and cream pattern. The weft thread is threaded through a wooden shuttle. Carmen's reading glasses are positioned on the tip of her nose. Her craft apron pockets hold small wooden tools. The morning light under the corredor is even and good for detailed work. Baskets of colored wool yarn sit on a low shelf beside the loom.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses on nose tip, dark blue craft apron over white embroidered blouse, sitting on low wooden stool at traditional backstrap loom, leather strap around lower back, leaning back for tension, half-finished colorful textile in red orange and cream with geometric pattern, wooden shuttle with thread, baskets of colored wool yarn on shelf, covered corredor with wooden columns and clay tile roof, even morning light, Villa de Leyva artisan workshop
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern setting, factory, machine loom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Centering the Clay
scenes.lighting: bright morning sun on courtyard, shade under corredor
scenes.description: Carmen kicks the foot pedal, and the pottery wheel begins to spin. She presses both wet hands around the clay as it rotates, pushing it inward and upward, centering the mass on the wheel. The clay wobbles then gradually becomes smooth and centered. Water and slip coat her hands and the wheel surface. Carmen's eyes are focused intently through her reading glasses. Her strong hands, despite wrinkles and age spots, command the clay. Michi the gray-and-white cat sits on the nearby shelf, mesmerized by the spinning wheel.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses, dark blue craft apron, pressing wet weathered hands around spinning gray clay on pottery kick wheel, centering clay, water and slip on hands, focused intense expression, sturdy wooden table, foot pedal, gray-and-white cat watching from nearby shelf with finished pottery, corredor workshop shade, bright courtyard in background, artisan pottery making
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern studio, electric wheel, clean hands, inappropriate

scenes.title: Mid-Morning Coffee Break
scenes.description: Carmen sits at the small wooden table in the courtyard, carrying a fresh mug of tinto and a small plate with pan de sagua — a traditional Boyaca cheese bread, golden and crusty. The courtyard is fully lit, warm sun on stone floor, potted plants vibrant. Purple bougainvillea cascades down the far wall. Canela the orange tabby has jumped onto Carmen's lap. Carmen strokes the cat while sipping coffee. The mug steams in the cool mountain air.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses, white embroidered blouse, burgundy cardigan, sitting at small wooden table in sunlit colonial courtyard, ceramic mug of steaming tinto coffee, small plate with golden cheese bread (pan de sagua), orange tabby cat on lap being stroked, stone floor, potted red geraniums, purple bougainvillea on whitewashed wall, wooden columns, warm morning sun, Villa de Leyva peaceful coffee break
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young woman, dark hair, modern cafe, indoor, American style, inappropriate

scenes.title: Teaching Sofia to Weave
scenes.lighting: warm afternoon light under corredor shade
scenes.description: Carmen sits at the loom with her 12-year-old granddaughter Sofia standing beside her. Carmen demonstrates the technique: lift the heddle, pass the shuttle through the shed, beat the weft into place. She hands the shuttle to Sofia, guiding the girl's hands. Sofia passes the shuttle carefully, tongue poking out in concentration. Carmen shows her how to use the wooden beater. Their hands work together — old weathered hands guiding young smooth ones. The loom clicks and thumps.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Colombian woman 75 years old with silver-white hair in bun, round reading glasses, craft apron, sitting at traditional backstrap loom teaching 12-year-old granddaughter to weave, old weathered hands guiding young smooth hands on wooden shuttle, girl with dark hair in ponytail concentrating, colorful textile on loom, wooden beater nearby, corredor shade with wooden columns, warm afternoon light, intergenerational craft teaching moment, loving grandmother-granddaughter scene, Villa de Leyva artisan workshop
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, alone, modern setting, factory, no child, inappropriate
